overview:
Cheryl Rosner was the CEO of BuyWithMe, (www.buywithme.com) the premier group buying website that connects shoppers with the best deals and offers from leading local merchants.

Rosner joined BuyWithMe in April 2010 after serving as President and Chief Executive Officer of TicketsNow, the world’s largest independent online marketplace for premium event tickets.

Prior to joining TicketsNow in 2007, Rosner was the President of Expedia Corporate Travel. In this role she was instrumental in the successful launch of the Canada and Germany divisions while generating consistent profitability.

Between 1999 to 2005, Rosner led Hotels.com to success as President, including creating and launching the popular Hotels.com brand. Under her leadership the website become the 6th most-visited travel site 60 days after launch. In 2004, Rosner was named one of the “25 Most Influential People in Travel” by Business Travel News.

Rosner sits on the Boards at SilverRail Technologies, Trazzler, Digital River and Conscious Capitalism Inc. Rosner has a Bachelorâ€™s Degree in Marketing from the University of Miami.
